name: Hoverkitty: Hoververse
description:
Meet Hoverkitty!


Hoverkitty is one cute, lovable, courageous, and determined futuristic momma!

... EVERYTHING you've been trained to expect of a strong female lead in the 21st century!

Join Hoverkitty as she enters the HOVERVERSE to rescue her best friend Hoverflea:


Defeat fiendish foes along the way!

Fiendish Foes:

Shadowcat:


Boss Slave:


Boss:


Recruit misunderstood monsters along the way!

Misunderstood Monsters:

Spiders:


... AND the MOST MISUNDERTSOOD MONSTER of ALL Mother:

Enter the Hoververse!

A guided, at times puzzling, self-meditation in what it means to be Hoverkitty whilst on a journey through the hazardous Hoververse to rescue her friend Hoverflea!


Enjoy the hundreds of hours of effort by solo game developer Bridget as she releases her very first 3D, casual, adventure platformer!

If you enjoy cats and a chiller kind of pace, then join us in the Hoververse!
